content.introduction: Write or paste the words in the window, and press the "Send form" button. The options "Analyze" gives all possible analyses, whereas the (default) option "Disambiguate" gives only the analyses appropriate for the given sentence. The program may also hyphenate the text for you, or add syllable boundaries, in which case it will not give a grammatical analysis. Choose "Hyphenate".

Write or paste the words in the window, and press the "Analyze" or "Reset" button. The options "Analyze" gives all possible analyses, whereas the (default) option "Disambiguate" gives only the analyses appropriate for the given sentence. The program may also hyphenate the text for you, or add syllable boundaries, in which case it will not give a grammatical analysis. Choose "Hyphenate".
Copy text into the window below, and the program will give you all possible morphological analyses of the wordforms in question.
Write or paste the words in the window, and press the "Send form" button. Note that the analyser still contains a handful of verbs.

Copy text into the window below, and the program will give you all possible morphological analyses of the wordforms in question. If you choose Disambiguate, it will make an attempt at choosing the analysis which suits the given context (warning: the development of the disambiguation program hasn't really started yet).

Write or paste the words in the window, and press the "Analyze" or "Reset" button. The options "Analyze" gives all possible analyses, whereas the (default) option "Disambiguate" gives only the analyses appropriate for the given sentence. The program may also hyphenate the text for you, or add syllable boundaries, in which case it will not give a grammatical analysis. Choose "Hyphenate".
content.introduction_p2: Some of the verbs included so far are: anwebi, aadizooke, bangishino, biindige, bimaadizi, gaasikanaabaagawe, gashkendamo, giigoonyike, giiwe, izhaa, jiibaakwe, maajaa, minikwe, wiisini, minomaagwad, gozigwan. Some of the nouns are: inini, ikwe, makwa, mitig, aanakwad, zaaga'igan, miikana, ziibi, makak, abwi, baabaa, maamaa, gosis, daanis, mishoomis.
You may also convert text from the Latin alphabet to syllabics or vice versa. Choose "Latin letters to syllabics" or "Syllabics to Latin letters"
You may also convert Iñupiaq text from the 8-bit IñupiaQ Dictionary encoding to Unicode (if your Iñupiaq text contains some of the letters e, f, x, b, you need to do this). Choose "Convert".

You may also transcribe Greenlandic text (of the current orthography) to an IPA transcription, enriched with syllable boundaries (marked with period) and tone marks, according to the presentation in Stig Bjørnums grammar (ulti- mately in Kleinschmidts grammar). Choose "Transcribe". Finally, you may convert words from the (pre-1973) Kleinschmidt orthography to the present orthography. The conversion tool recognises the letter kra, i.e. "ĸ" (Unicode U+0138), but since some users may not have support for it, the conversion tool will translate non-initially written capital K as if it was kra. Choose "Convert".
content.introduction: Write the word and grammatical specification in the window, and press the "Generate" or "Reset" button.

Write the place name in Saami, Norwegian, Swedish or Finnish. If the answer contains a name in parentheses, then this name is the name of the municipality in question. Our sources are Statens Kartverk (SK), Saami Parliament in Sweden (SvSt), Pekka Sammallahti "Saami-suoma sátnegirji" (PS) and Saami Atlas by H.R. Mathisen (SA).
Write a Buriat word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm. The program only works for a couple of nouns.
Write an Ojibwe word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm. The program only works for a couple of verbs.
Write a Cornish word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm.
Write a Faroese word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm.
The Finnish paradigm generator does not work yet.
The Finnish paradigm generator does not work yet.
The Kven paradigm generator does not work yet.
Write a Inupiaq word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm.
Write a Greenlandic word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm.
Впишите слова коми языка, и программа производит флективную парадигму
Write a Meadow Mari word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm.
Write a Mansi word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm.
Write a Erzya word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm.
The Russian paradigm generator does not work yet.
Write a Kildin Saami word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm. The program contains the words listed in the grammar appendix of Kuruch's dictionary.

Write a Pite Saami word and choose the part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm. Currently, the program contains most of the nouns and verbs found in the lexical database for Pite Saami (saami.uni-freiburg.de/psdp/pite-lex), which is regularly corrected, expanded and improved. This database is based on the Pitesamisk ordbok samt stavningsregler (Samica 2, 2016, edited by J. Wilbur), but also includes a few other words added by Ann-Charlotte Sjaggo. It is still under development.
Write a South Saami word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm.
Write a North Saami word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm.
Write a Lule Saami word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm.

Write a Inari Saami word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm. The program only contains the words in the appendix of Morottaja and Sammallahti, and it is still under development.

Write a Skolt Saami word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm. The program contains several thousand words from Itkonen, Moshnikoff, Sammallahti and modern social media. If you notice mistakes, please contact us at Giellatekno.
Write a Udmurt word and choose part of speech, and the program will generate the whole paradigm. The program contains thousands of words from the dictionaries by Saarinen et al, for instance.
Skriv basisforma av ordet og vel ordklasse, og programmet vil generere heile paradigmet for ordet.
content.usage: The analyser uses the Double Vowel (Fiero) system.
You may use both circumflex (â) and macron (ā) in order to mark long vowel.
Write the word in ordinary Mansi orthography. You may also write the words without length marks.
Write the word in Kildin Saami orthography. Note that we use Cyrillic Characters also for the Latin-looking ones. The program uses the 1985 orthography.
The program accepts both Norwegian æ and ø and Swedish ä and ö.
The program accepts both i and the South Saami character ï and both Norwegian æ, ø and Swedish ä, ö
Write The Saami special letters as usual. If you don't have a Saami keyboard, you may write "á, č, đ, ŋ, š, ŧ, ž" as a1, c1, d1, n1, s1, t1, z1.
You may use the ordinary Lule Saami characters, the (official) ŋ, or older ń, ñ, and the program understands both äö and æø.
Write the word in ordinary Inari Saami orthography.
Write the word in ordinary Skolt Saami orthography.
content.example: In order to get a Cornish wordform, write baseform+tags.
In order to get e.g. atimwak, write atim+N+AN+Pl, and in order to get kiwicihikonaw, write wicih+V+TA+Ind+Prs+3Sg+12PlO
In order to get e.g. húsinum, write hús+N+Neu+Sg+Dat+Def
In order to get e.g. joella, write joki+N+Sg+Ade
In order to get e.g. joela, write joki+N+Sg+Ade
In order to get e.g. jovella, write joki+N+Sg+Ade
In order to get e.g. iglum, write iglu+N+Rel+Sg
In order to get e.g. illup, write illu+N+Rel+Sg
In order to get e.g. кывлы, write кыв+N+Sg+Dat
In order to get e.g. кывлы, write кыв+N+Sg+Dat
In order to get e.g. олмам, write олма+N+Acc
In order to get e.g. улят, write уля+N+Sg+Loc
In order to get e.g. пангсто, write панго+N+Sg+Ela+Indef
In order to get e.g. тигров, write тигр+N+Msc+Pl+Acc
In order to get gåatan, write gåetie+N+Sg+Ill
In order to get e.g. viesus, write viessu+N+Sg+Loc.
In order to get e.g. gádov, write gáhtot+V+Ind+Prs+Sg1. For elluj and muv, write ællo+N+Sg+Ill and mån+Pron+Pers+Sg1+Acc.
In order to get e.g. kuäʹđest, write kueʹtt+N+Sg+Loc.
In order to get e.g. тэхэна, write ты+N+Sg+Loc
Write lemma + grammatical analysis in order to get the wordform.
content.instruction: Type the word form and grammatical code:
content.endtext: The program is under construction. If you notice errors of any kind, please report them to giellatekno@uit.no.
content.end: The program is under construction. If you notice errors of any kind, please report them to The Centre for Saami language technology.

The Lule Saami analysis program contains close to 20000 base forms (from Spiiks grammar, Nystø/Johnsens textbook Sámásta, and above all from Kintels and also Korhonens dictionaries), but much work still remains to be done. If you find errors or omissions, please report back to us in the Saami language technology team.

The program is in a test phase and it, contains only some words from the grammar section of the Sammallahti - Morottaja dictionary. If you notice errors of any kind, please report them to The Centre for Saami language technology.

The program contains several thousand words from Itkonen, Moshnikoff, Sammallahti and modern social media. If you notice errors of any kind, please report them to The Centre for Saami language technology.
The program is not finished. If you notice errouneous forms or analyses, please contact Giellatekno.
